General.Name: Shenzhen Vital New Material Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Vital New Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sales, and service of electronic welding materials in China and internationally. It offers solder pastes, flux, thermal interface material, solder wires and bars, three anti-paints, preformed solder tabs, solder balls, detergents, adhesives, copper pastes, and steel mesh wipes. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: No. 18 Whitney Industrial Park, Shenzhen, China, 518116
